title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Since 1971, the National Park Service has preserved and protected the land and water of Gulf Islands National Seashore.  Park leaders and employees are guided by the core principles of the National Park Service, the enabling legislation passed by Congress in the creation of the seashore, and the seashore's General Management Plan.  Explore this portion of our website to learn more about the park's management. Our Staff & Offices - Preserving and protecting Gulf Islands National Seashore. Laws & Policies - The rules & regulations for Gulf Islands National Seashore. Freedom of Information Act - How to submit a Freedom of Information Act request. Fire Management - Preserving the natural beauty of the seashore through controlled burns.
